titleStmt.title: An Exact and perfect relation of the arrival of the ship the James and Mary, Captain Phipps commander with 2000000l. in gold and silver taken up in nine fathom water from the bottom of the sea, being a suppos'd wreck of a Spanish galion, cast-away above 43 years ago among the Bahama Islands / as it was taken from the aforesaid captain ...

An Exact and perfect relation of the arrival of the ship the James and Mary, Captain Phipps commander with 2000000l. in gold and silver taken up in nine fathom water from the bottom of the sea, being a suppos'd wreck of a Spanish galion, cast-away above 43 years ago among the Bahama Islands / as it was taken from the aforesaid captain ...
titleStmt.author: Phips, William, Sir, 1651-1695.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
